column2:
Automate tasks or processes based on data changes in the table.
Trigger: When record updated, When record created, When record updated or created, When form submitted, At scheduled time.
Action: Update record, Create record, Get record, Send email, HTTP request
Logic: Condition.

column2: Import incremental data into an existing table.
Display information in a Kanban view, typically used for project management or task tracking.
Global control of user behavior (register/create space)
Restrict the field from having duplicate values.
Restrict the field from having empty values.
Track and record the modification history of records for traceability and auditing.
Display the modifier and creator of this record.
Undo previous operations and redo undone operations.
Yes, comprehensive role-based access control, including Base permission, Table permission, row-level security, and field-level security!
User/space/base usage management, global permission overview, auditing
Allows to withdraw deleted base/tables/fields/records
Display data in chart form for better understanding and analysis.
Add comments or feedback on records for discussion and collaboration.
Choose external bases in the Link Field.
Display images or media content in an album view, typically used for image libraries or media management.
OAuth integrations let users grant your service or application API access to their Teable data.
Visualize the records in a calendar format, making it easier to view and manage time-based data.
Organizations can centrally manage members, teams and spaces created by members. Support domain verification.
Take snapshot for base, export a base, import a base
Auto-generate data for a field through a prompt.
Built-in template center, self-service management and release of templates.
Talk directly to your database! Whether it's in the interface or the API.
Click the button to automatically perform a preset action based on the current record data.
Use AI to build custom application interfaces.
A powerful AI assistant from application building, automated workflows, data insights, and support in all aspects.
Run Typescript or Javascript on browser or automation action
Log user behavior
Customize third-party diagrams, views, widgets, external portals
When a record is changed, added, or deleted, as well as when a form is submitted, an HTTP request is sent to a predetermined URL.
Connect to an existing database and use teable directly on existing business data
Highlight rows based on specific conditions.
Join our Discord for feedback: https://discord.gg/uZwp7tDE5W
Use url param to "preset" filter/sort/group on a shared view
Integrate with Zapier, Make Etc
Custom field calculation behavior enables the retrieval of data from external data sources, the invocation of APIs, the execution of code to update data, and the marketplace.
Control the visibility of the view
